website_summaries.verdict: Versatile collection of lacrosse balls that works for practice, recreational games, or competitive game play.
pros: Helpful for some practice drills to have multiple colors of balls available
Durable style of molded rubber ball that will stand up to repeated use
Has official size and weight to ensure they’ll be appropriate to use in all situations, including NCAA and NFHS leagues
Good option for those seeking a massage therapy tool
cons: Ball doesn’t seem to work well for playing with dogs, who may destroy it with constant chewing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because the quality of the balls are not good. I compared them to those balls previously ordered from the same seller. The new ones were soft, bouncing a lot, easily nick or scraped, very smelly, and came with a lot of powders on the balls. (not easy to wash off) I don't think they met the standard set up by Lacrosse Assoc. Because of the smell and powders, I will not use them for massage. They had their success but they cannot keep the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Myofascial release technique
customer_reviews.text: I don’t play lacrosse, but I put 4 of them in a mesh laundry bag for myofascial release and it is great to get at those cramps in my hamstring. I bet it would be great for a stiff neck or back, too. Just get the small mesh bag so it moves a little but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for massage balls
customer_reviews.text: My brother is a massage therapist and a juggler and he recommended I get these for rolling out. I have a basket in my dance room with 6 of these, 3 tennis balls, and 2 cork balls so I can juggle or roll out alone or with friends. So far I've been preferring my cork balls but I like having these on hand as well.
customer_reviews.author: cookie.dough

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to puppy attack!
customer_reviews.text: LOL...we obviously got these for our daughter who plays lacrosse....HOWEVER, we have a pup who loves finding these. She'll literally scratch at our daughters lacrosse bag to get at them. They are obviously great on the field for lacrosse time. As well as being enjoyed by our little 10 lb. Yorkie terrier mix pup...you can't tell pup has attacked the balls either! They may be scuffed up but no bite marks to prove puppers attack!
customer_reviews.author: Primeshopfam

customer_reviews.title: Orange lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lacrosse balls. My sons have begun playing and these are the same ones that they used at a summer lacrosse camp. They have a good weight behind them and quite honestly they can hurt if you don't catch them and they hit your body.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Got to have some color for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: These lacrosse balls are a hit for kids of all ages! I mix my ball bucket with all different colors. I always hide a black "Money Ball" in the bucket. Scoring with the Money Ball is always more points. Amazing how adding colored lacrosse balls to your workouts makes it more fun.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Corveddu

customer_reviews.title: Orange color easy to see all over your lawn!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I should give 5 stars or 1. My dog loves these balls!!! 5 stars right? Sure .. if only my kids played lacrosse, sadly they don't, BUT our neighbors do!! Every morning runs up the hill, steals one off their lawn and brings it home to play. I didnt realize he was stealing until one morning when I decided to clean out under my Kitchen Island and found his stash. These were bought as a gift to replace the stolen items and hopefully keep him out of the puppy pound. Cross your fingers. He's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves These Balls
customer_reviews.text: He's become a ball snob. Turns his nose up at Chuck it and boring old tennis balls. These have great bounce especially on hard surfaces - they're definitely heavier than tennis balls so don't use them anywhere where there are breakables. Oh, and they don't float.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Scan

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my dog (but they're great for humans too)
customer_reviews.text: My foster pitty (90 lbs) is a determined chewer and strips + destroys tennis balls in 60 seconds. She loves playing with balls that bounce though, so I though I'd try the sturdiest ones I've ever used. 2 weeks later and she's only been able to make a few surface scratches on her ball, and I can use the other ones to massage my feet, legs, and back. Mine will probably last forever if she doesn't steal them from me and hide them.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Siyuan Guo

customer_reviews.title: Great for massager
customer_reviews.text: I use to massage tight muscles and it works perfectly for that! I literally roll one under my foot much of the day standing at my desk--these are a little softer than Champion, but work great for massager. I can't speak to actual Lacrosse play.
customer_reviews.author: GLo

customer_reviews.title: Massage with these! Plus the dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a lacrosse ball ...or 5...in your life, buy these! Dogs go crazy for them, they are perfect for rolling over tight muscles, bust boredom by bouncing on around. I don't play lacrosse but I bet they're great for that too. I've had dicks sporting goods lacrosse balls and these are exactly the same. Love the colors and the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bair

customer_reviews.title: Great for Massage
customer_reviews.text: I use this for getting knots out in my back and this work like no other. It's study and it doesn't leave residue on your clothes. It's also great to travel with so if you're looking for something portable, this is it. I found out about this through a coworker and haven't regretted it since!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: While I do not know much about lacrosse, these balls have the feel, the weight and performance of my idea of a real, game legal ball. These are not toys. I have seen abd used balls that are toys, they do not come out of the pocket cleanly nor fly true. Having used these, they have a coating or finish that makes the ball perform properly. The ball has the appropriate weight to be caught and fit snug in the pocket. Very pleased with my purchase. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz_Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Solid LAX option.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1/2 dozen of these for my boys. I got them the lime green ones and in hindsight will order a different color in the future. One that doesn't blend in as well with our grass and hedgerow. Appear to be good quality LAX balls and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: Balls are real deal. Regulations for lacrosse balls are met or exceeded. Great bargain. My grandson has just started playing lacrosse and i got them for him to practice his shooting technique. He's a great beginning player, but his shots sail wide sometimes. Hoping these will help..
customer_reviews.author: Phargot

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for massage and make a great toy for strong dogs
customer_reviews.text: Lacrosse balls in our house are used for massage (check out youtube) or for the dogs. We have big dogs that destroy any toy. The lacrosse balls stand up to the punishment & when they do finally start to go the chunks are digestible.At least my mine haven't had issues. Yes, I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel J

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I played LAX in highschool and I learned that my dog loved lacrosse balls because she stole them from me. I bought a pack of them because she destroys tennis balls and loses interest in them very quick but absolutely loves lacrosse balls and they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These are 6 orange balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for massaging. I haven't used them yet, but they are spherical and orange just like they are supposed to be. I've never played lacrosse, but I assume these are legitimate lacrosse balls. They are uniform in size. Don't know what else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Odog17

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These are good lacrosse balls that are decently priced. My son has the ability to lose more things quickly than I know what to do. So, I need to find good value.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit early to review, but they seem good quality. They come too sticky though, but a little use should solve that. At first they would stick in the pocket a bit. If they grease up quickly, I'll come back and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: seanryan11

customer_reviews.title: These lacrosse balls are very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These lacrosse balls are very good quality. We actually built a ninja warrior course and drilled a hole in 3 of the 6 balls for a ball grip. They are holding up nicely even after the hole was drilled in them. We tried other types of balls and the ball just broke or wore down after hanging on them. So far these have worked great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these lacrosse balls for a short time but they seem to be just what we needed for extra practice in the yard. I only gave 4 stars for durability because we've only had them a week, so don't really know if they'll hold up for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: Works great for rolling out sore muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Bought these for getting out knots and applying pressure to sore muscles after a hard workout. I gave away some as gifts. They all liked them.
customer_reviews.author: xylina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these balls and it’s the first time they haven’t been able to destroy them! Great product!!! Great durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great product. My boys use these for lacrosse practice at home or the park. The yellow makes it visible so we dont loose them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Guernick

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought 60 and in just over a week’s use, we’ve had at least a dozen have split down the middle. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how these are for actual Lacrosse, but they didn’t stand up to my American Bulldog/Pit Bull/Mastiff mix. He had one chewed up in about 5 minutes. Granted, most pups are not his level of chewer....it’s like heavy chewer x1000. We’ll continue to search for something that will last more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves their purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Use these for at home back yard practices so they serve the purpose I need them for but I think they are definitely different from the more pricy balls. Not sure if these would actually be legal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palm

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quality LAX balls
customer_reviews.text: Good quality LAX balls . I use them for LAX practice and to play fetch with my pups. Balls are durable, but cheap enough to let the dogs mess around with a bit too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog. They fit neatly into the medium dog medium ball thrower, have great bounce, and outlast dog chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Fun
customer_reviews.text: Everything good like I thought. Color, quality, price for 12 is good. Recommend and want more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balls!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to play fetch with our Golden Retrievers and they LOVE THEM! They bounce all over the yard, it's hilarious! They are better than any other "dog" ball that the pups just chew up or rip apart. These balls are solid, heavy and so far indestructible. Do you make a glow in the dark ball? Thanks! Go Pats!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its use
customer_reviews.text: I use these balls for massaging deep muscle tissue specifically in my upper traps. The ball is sturdy and perfect for massaging. I also use it on my clients for other parts such as hamstrings and quads. Great quality !
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Lovelovelove!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find these pink and black lacrosse balls for a more than reasonable price. They did not stink as badly as some others I have purchased online and the color is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Fly

customer_reviews.title: for lacrosse only, I guess
customer_reviews.text: bought for my power chewer, who destroys chuck it balls in 5 minutes. He shredded these like styrofoam in 2.....other brands of lacrosse balls were so sturdy, I thought these might be also. Glad he didn't swallow any of it, a million chunks. =:o{
customer_reviews.author: laura wagner

customer_reviews.title: What IS lacrosse all about, anyway?
customer_reviews.text: I mean, I don’t use these balls for lacrosse, but they’re great for my young piano students to bounce and develop hand-eye coordination. Bounce in time. Bounce to a rhythm. Bonus: soothes tight muscles when rolled on your neck or back. Love the colors, too. But I’m not qualified to speak about how good they are at their actual function as lacrosse balls!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight
customer_reviews.text: To be totally honest, I purchased these for relieving back pain. I place the ball between the wall and trigger points on my back and hip per my PT specialist. These are perfect for those exercises!
customer_reviews.author: zonietj

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has quickly destroyed every ball and toy we tried. The Velocity Lacrosse Balls have held up for months and show no signs of damage. Our dog seems to like the fact that they bounce higher and roll much farther that other balls.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget L.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be more durable than normal balls, so I bought a bunch of them thinking they would last me a while. Within a few days they were all shiners and basically unusable. They’re a huge waste of money and if you should get some ECD mint or pearls if you want balls that will last more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Kropp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog who has chewed through multiple “tough” balls. She loves these and no teeth marks no damage. I LOVE these!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Their balls don’t stink!
customer_reviews.text: This was my best case of balls by far. I have received shipments in the past that have given me headaches because of the chemical odors. Lacrosse Balls Direct have the best smelling balls by far. It’s an odd/funny to say but it’s the truth! And the free shipping won me over!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled to find toys for our 80 pound pit until we tried out our daughter's Lacrosse balls. Yes, we recognize that these are not meant as pet toys but tell my dog that, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: marc kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog because she demolishes tennis balls. They are very durable and a loooovely pink color. Love them, and so does she!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Not as hard as most lax balls
customer_reviews.text: My son no longer plays lacrosse but we still let our lab play with the balls, since they are the only balls she can't chew up. Unfortunately, she chewed one of these up in less than 30 minutes. I don't know what that means as far as the official game is concerned, but we were disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got these for stretching and rolling out (not lacrosse) but they are great quality and everyone liked them!
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic LAX Balls for price!
customer_reviews.text: The LAX balls are really good quality for price. I actually made a second purchase of them. Son loves them to use in the backyard to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Would buy agin
customer_reviews.text: Our boys lose theirs so often we need to replace them a lot, they are great lacrosse balls. I will keep buying these for them.
customer_reviews.author: Brannie2x

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable rubber smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lacrosse balls to help roll out knots in my back and shoulders. The rubber smell is overwhelming and stinks up an entire room. I have tried everything I know to remove it with no success. We have purchased and used this brand before a few years ago and they didnt smell at all. But these new ones are awful. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I started to use them right away. Have one on each floor of my house and 1 in each car. Great for working on tight muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rolison

customer_reviews.title: Use them for stretching, not lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for our use... we use them for stretching and "therapy-like" stuff for our baseball team. Quality is good, happy with purchase, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SeaRayDA

customer_reviews.title: Official size & weight lacrosse balls!
customer_reviews.text: Great lacrosse balls. Good value for the money & speedy delivery. Official size & weight, great for outdoor & indoor field use.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: These are great solid lacrosse balls. They are nice and bright to avoid getting lost. We've had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Bright!  Arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Like the brightness! We can find them easily in the woods! Great Order, ship to delivery time. LAX balls were just as described
customer_reviews.author: kXn

customer_reviews.title: Love the black
customer_reviews.text: Love the black color. They do Lose that dark color over time. Several of them now have a white film on them. Still very distinctive.
customer_reviews.author: Overachiever

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Would order again. Bought the 12pack. The package contained 2 packages with 6 balls in each. We use them at our dog park because they bounce so well and are easy to find (yellow).
customer_reviews.author: ssurj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use them to work out myofascial pain, I keep a couple at work and some in my house, and some in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are going to get blue balled, these cannot be beat
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY blue balls I ever recommend. Any other type of blue balls should be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Just a girl

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: For my 10 year old very durable and he liked that they came in different colors
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: LAX balls
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them - now if he could keep them in the back yard. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: KNak

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These balls are a great value for the money. With three lacrosse players in the household, we need lots of balls for practice during the season. I would recommend this purchase to anyone who needs to have lax balls on hand for practice and random pick up games too :).
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 8 blessings

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love to play with these balls! We can throw them much farther than a tennis ball and they can't chew these up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 3 year old lab, because she destroys EVERYTHING! But these she could not! They make a great dog toy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lacrosse!
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality, love the colors and I would definitely recommend and or buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Bought for dog
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our dog, and she loves them. Slight bounce and easy for her to chew on without destroying..
customer_reviews.author: Slmeads1234

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and quality products. My dogs love them. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal for high Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good balls with same hardness and weight as all lacrosse official balls. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walpole

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: The color was bright and unique helping is keep track of our balls at practice and as it gets dark.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I recently starting Airrosti therapy and this item is great to get to the pressure points.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: good deal, good balls
customer_reviews.text: good deal, good balls. easy to find in a field (got the orange ones). my teenage son uses these for practice. would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Flavorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Self Soft Tissue Mobilization
customer_reviews.text: These lacrosse balls work great for Self Soft Tissue Mobilization. They are not only inexpensive but work well for many types of muscle issues. I use these almost everyday for one sore muscle or another. These are easily one of my favorite rehab tools!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Proudfoot

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves these so I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value - seem like normal lax balls
customer_reviews.text: Good value - seem like normal lax balls at a good price per ball
customer_reviews.author: thomas andersen

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The lacrosse balls were as described appear to be of good quality rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Ms2004

customer_reviews.title: Needed these for school- they’re perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to help our student- research has shown that bouncing balls balances neurotransmitters, increases focus, and creates neural pathways in the prefrontal cortex. #neuraled. Obviously not enough for all of our students but it’s a start
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massage ball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my opinion. Use it as a massage ball. Cool color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Theway808

customer_reviews.title: great colors
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the different color options. Easy to keep track of when playing on turf or at home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Duran

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter a few weeks ago. She’s used them at practice and in the backyard. So far, no complaints. I love them because of the bright colors she doesn’t lose them in the woods behind our house!
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Great lax balls
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They are good textures and being bright are easy to find as he loses his others often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lacrosse Balls
customer_reviews.text: The lacrosse balls arrived quickly and the color is great! We ordered orange and they are visible even at dusk when my son is still playing in the backyard. They are durable and also work great for placing under your back for a massage!
customer_reviews.author: Ladies1st

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Needed some lacrosse balls to have at home and work, these work great, bright yellow, nice and firm
customer_reviews.author: h8ata38

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Just what we wanted and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: great for trigger point therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't play lacrosse. But, these are great for trigger point therapy.
customer_reviews.author: SHG

customer_reviews.title: Make your friends jealous when you show them you now have 120 lacrosse balls
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 2 boxes, they're lacrosse balls but when you have 120 of them, it's even more fun to dump them all out and shoot into a net. Meanwhile your friends who have a ball bag with about 30 at best will be watching you improve while they sit and wait.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Pokorny

customer_reviews.title: Very durable dog ball!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our black lab and she usually chews through all her balls within a day and these hold up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my black Labrador retriever to play with. Lacrosse balls are the only toys he is not able to destroy, these took him two minutes to chew in pieces. Chinese quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Balls
customer_reviews.text: Round, yellow, and hurts when you get hit with them! Awesome!!! Nice balls!
customer_reviews.author: RFORD

customer_reviews.title: High quality balls
customer_reviews.text: My son is just starting to play lacrosse but these balls seem to be great. They even are good for massaging aches and pains in your back. I have only had them a few weeks so I cannot say how durable they are. They are pretty expensive for one ball though but if they hold up it will be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massage balls for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and so do my students. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Coneise Raawiya Always Open Notary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak to immediate use as we just got them. My son likes them and the colors are fun. As we haven't had them for very long, I can't review them for longevity of use/how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Not Polished Though
customer_reviews.text: The Lacrosse balls showed up quickly, are of high-quality, and will definitely work for what I was looking for. They do claim in their description that all the seams are "polished" which they aren't, but doesn't seem to affect the performance or rolling, just not completely smooth as I was expecting. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 dozen for my son so he can practice in between practices and games. Excellent quality! We will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: MelissaH

customer_reviews.title: Colorful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors- they always make me smile!! I use these with my chiropractic patients for sore muscles. They’re just the right heft with just a bit of rubbery give. My patients and I love ‘em. And delivery is always prompt and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 teenages who play lacrosse. They loved the balls, and have been using them since we received the . They are getting a lot of practice with them and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Chiarello

customer_reviews.title: Physical Theropy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to massage the knots in my muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. My son has been shooting non stop now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, my husband and I actually use these balls for trigger point therapy so we like to stash several balls at home and work.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product is the size, shape and elasticity of expected item. I bought these for massage, not lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these due to price and our lab/pit mix destroying every dog toy/ball we’ve ever had. These are perfect size and he can’t destroy them no matter how hard he tries. If they don’t work as lacrosse balls, you should market them in pet toys.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 dozen of these as client gifts and they are as expected. Great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Valaes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The bright lrange color is easy to see. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Velocity Lacrosse Balls – Official Sized NFHS, SEI, and NCAA Approved - Meets NOCSAE Standard | Approved Competition Colors and Single or Bulk Sizing Available.
feature_bullets: 𝐇𝐈𝐆𝐇 𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐍𝐂𝐄: 6 Pack of Velocity lacrosse balls are made with molded rubber construction, perfect for training, tournament, and competitive game play for kids and adults. From Elementary school, high school and college play. Expect great handing and accuracy in practice or play.
𝐆𝐑𝐄𝐀𝐓 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐒𝐂𝐇𝐎𝐎𝐋 𝐒𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐒 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐅𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐈𝐎𝐍𝐀𝐋: Approved by the NCAA/NFHS and certified to improve shooting accuracy & handling during gameplay & practice.

𝐃𝐔𝐑𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 & 𝐄𝐀𝐒𝐘 𝐓𝐎 𝐔𝐒𝐄: 100% Solid Rubber Built. Official size and weight makes it great for playing lacrosse. Each lacrosse ball is created out of premium rubber making them great for all types of play, from training to tournaments.

𝐌𝐀𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄 𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐀𝐏𝐘: Use across many platforms to improve your health and quality of life, including CrossFit, foot massage, physical therapy, back pain, sore muscle relief, myofascial trigger points and many more massage therapy procedures.
𝐂𝐎𝐋𝐎𝐑𝐒: Many Colors to Choose from: White, Yellow, Orange, Red, Lime Green, Purple, Pink, Black, Blue, Teal & Mix Colors.
